settings.title: Senior Fitness Appropriate Classes and Programs
settings.content:
Senior-level fitness classes and programs optimized for senior living community

New classes and programs added regularly

settings.title: Custom Program Development
settings.content: Circolo develops custom programs for select communities.

settings.title: Premium Technology to Delight Your Residents
settings.content:
With a responsive touchscreen, favorite classes are just one tap away

Immersive class experience with large display and Hi-Fi sound

settings.title: Diverse Content for Your Entire Community
settings.content:
With Circolo proprietary content and YouTube integration, residents have practically unlimited fitness classes to choose from. Caregivers benefit too and can enjoy workouts to keep them alert and fit.

There is always something for everyone.

settings.title: Join Any Zoom
settings.content: Join any live-streamed Zoom classes or physical therapy sessions. Receive invaluable feedback from fitness instructors or physical therapists who can monitor your whole form.

settings.title: Unlimited User Profiles
settings.content: Create individual profiles so residents can come back to their favorite classes anytime

settings.title: The Village at Hayes Valley Assisted Living & Memory Care
